Data: Harbhajan to Watson, no run beaten, short of a good length outside off and held its line, Watson played for the turn and missed
Harbhajan to Watson, no run turning in from a good length outside off, gets outside the line and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run short outside off and appears to hold its line again, Watson shapes to play the cut, misses, some extra bounce there for the spinner
Harbhajan to Watson, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and works it to midwicket
Harbhajan to Watson, no run accurate here, just a fraction outside off and getting it to turn in from a good length, pushed to extra cover, lovely start
Harbhajan to Watson, no run and it's a maiden, short of a good length, turning in, punched off the back foot to mid-off, excellent start by Harbhajan
Nehra to Warner, FOUR runs smacked for four, short outside off, cuts it in that gap between cover and point, races to the boundary
Nehra to Warner, no run some swing there for Nehra, getting it to shape away, lands on a good length, knocks it down into the off side
Nehra to Warner, 1 run good bounce, takes off from a good length, drops it from the crease just wide of midwicket for a single
Nehra to Watson, no run shortish outside off, reaches to play the cut but does not connect, much quicker than he would have expected
Nehra to Watson, SIX runs short and he takes full toll this time, gets forward and shovels it high and handsome over long-on for a big six
Nehra to Watson, 1 run short of a good length, opens the face and guides that one to third man to keep the strike
Harbhajan to Watson, no run turning in, gets forward, bends low and goes for the sweep, struck high on the pads

Harbhajan to Watson, 2 runs dropped, a tough chance but he could have clasped it, short on leg stump and it's swept hard and Jadeja at square leg tries to take it over his head while moving to his right but is unable to hold on
Harbhajan to Watson, no run goes for the sweep again, targeting square leg, misses and is struck high on the pads
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run flighted, lands full on the off, driven hard down the ground to long-on for a single
Harbhajan to Warner, no run coming round the wicket and floating it on a good length on the off, makes room to crack that through the off side, mistimes it to extra cover
Harbhajan to Warner, 1 run much quicker, short of a good length on middle, turned into the leg side towards midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, no run tight line, lands on a good length on the off, pushed to extra cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run comes down the track and chips it over midwicket, long-on gets round to it in time to keep them to a single
Jadeja to Watson, no run slower through the air, slightly short outside off, turning away, played to point
Jadeja to Watson, SIX runs That's over the roof, long hop, got into position early, moved back and pulled it powerfully over the stands, among the biggest sixes we've seen this tournament
Jadeja to Watson, SIX runs another one, short one again, Jadeja gifting freebies here, Watson gets back and pulls it over wide long-on, just over mind you but a poor ball nevertheless

Jadeja to Watson, SIX runs We won't see Jadeja in this game for a while after this, three short deliveries in a row, this time on middle and leg and Watson dispatches it into the crowd behind square for another big one
Harbhajan to Warner, 1 run pushed off the front foot wide of extra cover for a single
Harbhajan to Watson, FOUR runs short, went on straight but Watson, unlike in the first over, was ready. Moved back and cut it well past a diving point for a boundary
Harbhajan to Watson, no run really slow through the air this time, played the sweep to early, landed on a good length and struck him on the waist, Bowden says no, it could have just gone over
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run slog-swept but straight towards deep midwicket for a single
Harbhajan to Warner, 1 run pushed through the line towards long-off for a single
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run fetching it from a good length outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket for one more, another tidy over from Harbhajan
Khan to Watson, 1 run trying to push it full outside off, defends it with an open face and it rolls towards third man
Khan to Warner, 2 runs cracked off the back foot towards point, Raina dives to his left and palms it towards Yusuf who returns a strong throw to the bowler's end and concedes an overthrow
Khan to Warner, SIX runs came off the meat, a length delivery in the slot outside off and Warner hits it through the line over long-off for a six
Khan to Warner, no run held back the length, short on middle, jabs it towards midwicket
Khan to Warner, no run just a fraction short outside off and Warner wants to dismiss it into the stands over square leg, misses
Khan to Warner, 1 run short of a good length on middle, turned away towards deep midwicket for a single
Pathan to Warner, 1 run fires it on a good length outside off, taps it through point for a single
Pathan to Watson, 1 run pushing it quick, mistimes a sweep towards deep square leg, was a little late on the shot
Pathan to Warner, 1 run bowls it on a good length outside off and he cracks it hard towards deep cover for one more
Pathan to Watson, 1 run slightly short outside off, dragged to deep midwicket for one more
Pathan to Warner, 1 run short of a good length on middle, worked wide of midwicket for a single
Pathan to Watson, no run ooh, almost, short and he tries to swing it over midwicket, misses and it just escapes off stump
Khan to Warner, no run short of a good length on the off, punched towards point
Khan to Warner, FOUR runs picked it from a length on middle, Warner had picked his spot and smacked it over midwicket, Yuvraj runs to his left from long-on but can't cut it off
Khan to Warner, 1 run knocked away wide of midwicket for a single
Khan to Watson, SIX runs clearing the ropes comfortably here, confident shot, bowled on a good length, made room and swung it over long-on
Khan to Watson, 1 run aiming for the yorker there, almost gets it right, pushes it past the bowler for a single
Khan to Warner, 1 run Ouch, that must hurt, Watson gets struck by Warner, full toss and it's drilled back straight to the non-striker, they manage a single somehow
Pathan to Warner, no run extra bounce, Warner had prepared himself for a cut, tries to cut it past point, misses
Pathan to Warner, no run shortish, pushed off the back foot to point
Pathan to Warner, 1 run worked off the back foot past midwicket for a single
Pathan to Watson, 1 run picked the length early there, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
Pathan to Warner, 1 run short of a good length on middle, makes room and dabs it back to the bowler
Pathan to Watson, 2 runs short again, slaps it just wide of long-on and rushes back for the second
Jadeja to Warner, SIX runs ..to be smashed for another six! Unlike his previous deliveries, that one was bowled on a length, cleared his right foot and struck it flat over long-on

Jadeja to Warner, SIX runs five consecutive sixes off Jadeja, tossed it up, came down the track and chipped it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket, timed it well enough to clear the ropes
Jadeja to Warner, SIX runs six sixes in a row off Jadeja, bowled it flat this time but it was a length delivery on the off stump, made a bit of room and thrashed it into the stands over long-on
Jadeja to Warner, no run short and wide, extra bounce, breaks the run, tries to cut, misses
Jadeja to Warner, no run bowled full, struck hard along the ground back to the bowler, dives to stop that, it crashes into the stumps at the other end
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run fired it short and wide, Warner had charged forward, tried to cut it through point, got an inside edge past the keeper for a single
Pathan to Warner, 1 run
Pathan to Watson, 1 run pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
Pathan to Warner, 1 run some turn there as well as extra bounce, adjusts well, taking his bottom hand off and playing it down with soft hands, a single behind point to bring up his half-century
Pathan to Watson, SIX runs Watson gets to his fifty in style, another long hop, short outside off and it's hammered over deep midwicket
Pathan to Watson, OUT gone, kept a little low, didn't bounce as much as he wanted to, short of a good length and he tried to repeat the shot from the previous ball, missed and was bowled
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run pushed it full on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run drops it in front of point for a single
Nehra to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled short on middle, knocked it down in front of cover for a single
Nehra to Hussey, SIX runs banged it short outside off, looked a little off balanced when he struck that but he managed to smear it over deep midwicket, a flat six
Nehra to Hussey, no run short of a good length, pushed towards cover for a single
Nehra to Hussey, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
Nehra to Hussey, no run slightly short, didn't rise as much, punched towards extra cover
Pathan to Warner, SIX runs The attack continues, short of a good length, Warner moves away and pulls it miles over deep midwicket
Pathan to Warner, 1 run fires it short on middle, makes room and opens the face to play it behind point for a single
Pathan to Hussey, SIX runs No letting up from David Hussey here, slower through the air, he made room and lofted it cleanly over wide long-off for six
Pathan to Hussey, no run
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run played down the ground towards long-on for a single
Pathan to Warner, 1 run hurling it on the off, dabs it wide of point to keep the strike
Yuvraj to Warner, SIX runs not treating him any differently, hammered over long-on, India's misery continues
Yuvraj to Warner, no run a hit and a miss, tries to smote it over long-on, misses
Yuvraj to Warner, SIX runs flighted, lands on a length and Warner backs himself again, bending low and slog-sweeping it over deep midwicket
Yuvraj to Warner, 1 run short of a good length outside off, cracked hard towards deep cover
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run

Yuvraj to Warner, OUT India will be relieved, short outside off, much quicker, tries to crash it hard through the off side, some extra bounce there, gets an edge and Dhoni snaps it, no doubt in the umpire's mind, that was out
Yuvraj to Hussey, FOUR runs short on the off, moves back and slaps it wide of long-off for a boundary, came off the meat
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run just outside leg stump, dragged towards midwicket for a single
Yuvraj to Haddin, OUT stumped, gets some turn, lands on a good length, Haddin steps out of the crease and tries to clear extra cover, misses as it spins away and Dhoni does the rest
Yuvraj to White, 1 run pushed gently towards long-off for a single
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run short and he tries to pull it through square leg, deliberately bowled outside leg stump after the batsman had made way
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run fires it full on middle, Hussey can only dig it out back to the bowler
Nehra to White, no run tight line to start with, bowls it on a good length on middle, White defends it into the off side
Nehra to White, 1 run fuller, its struck through midwicket into the deep for a single
Nehra to Hussey, FOUR runs four, slightly slower there, waited for it after it landed short, made room and pulled it powerfully wide of long-on
Nehra to Hussey, OUT slower one again, bowled on a length on middle and he didn't appear to pick it, tried to clear long-on but failed, Vijay took it comfortably a few yards inside the ropes
Nehra to White, 1 run full on the off, driven towards long-off for a single
Nehra to Hussey, no run nipped back in a hint from the off, defended cautiously back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run shortish outside off, turning in, dabs it behind point for a single
Harbhajan to Haddin, 1 run closes the face and works it through square leg for a single
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run comes round the wicket, pushes it quick and full on the off stump, driven to long-off
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run gets across and pushes it in front of midwicket
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run varying in pace, quicker, bowled on a good length on middle, plays it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run the end of an excellent spell, pushed full on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
Khan to Hussey, FOUR runs and is welcomed with a boundary, short and it's pulled between deep midwicket and deep square leg
Khan to Hussey, 1 run full outside off, moves away and pushes it wide of extra cover for a single
Khan to Haddin, 1 run full toss on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
Khan to Hussey, 2 runs full outside off, makes room and places it wide of extra cover for a couple of runs
Khan to Hussey, 1 wide short, slow and too wide, called by the umpire
Khan to Hussey, 1 run aiming for the blockhole and gets it right this time, digs it out past the bowler for a single
Khan to Haddin, SIX runs a meaty full toss and Haddin doesn't waste the opportunity, stands back and sends it into the crowd behind deep midwicket
Khan to White, 1 run full toss on the off, smacked towards long-off for just the single
Khan to Hussey, 2 runs a couple this time, full toss again, swung wide of long-on for a quick two
Khan to Hussey, 1 run bowls it full on the off, mistimes it towards long-on for a single
Khan to White, 1 run leading edge there, low full toss outside leg stump, tried to close the face to play it fine, played a touch too early and it lobbed behind Zaheer
Khan to Hussey, no run landed on a good length outside off, Hussey, surprisingly, left it alone, probably thought that was a wide but it clearly wasn't
Khan to Hussey, 1 run inswinging yorker from Zaheer, tries to force it through midwicket, can only manage a single towards point
Nehra to Hussey, 2 runs slower one, dragged past midwicket into the deep for a couple
Nehra to Hussey, 2 runs low full toss on the off, driven in the wide long-on region for a couple more
Nehra to Hussey, no run swing and a miss, slower one, Hussey comes down the track and tries to launch him over midwicket, makes no contact, a dot ball
Nehra to Hussey, no run excellent stuff from Nehra, short of a good length, tries to slap it past the bowler, mistimes it straight back to him
Nehra to Hussey, OUT yorker and the leg stump is knocked out, superb bowling from Nehra this final over, in the blockhole, Hussey tries to cart it through midwicket, misses and is bowled
Nehra to Smith, 1 run tries to slog him over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads and snatches a single

Australia, after that opening stand, looked good to go beyond 200 but India have dragged it back somewhat, conceding just 23 in the last four overs bowled by Yuvraj, Zaheer and Nehra. Nevertheless, this is a challenging score but India have a line-up that bats deep, The boundaries
M Vijay and Gautam Gambhir have made their way out. We are set for the chase. Dirk Nannes has the ball. A slip in place
Nannes to Vijay, no run on target, lands on a good length on the off, Vijay plays that off the back foot towards the bowler
Nannes to Vijay, no run short of a good length on the off, defended off the back foot to extra cover
Nannes to Vijay, no run getting it to shape away from the right hander, Vijay shoulders arms to that one
Nannes to Vijay, no run short of a good length outside off, punched off the back foot to point
Nannes to Vijay, 2 runs short on middle, shapes up for the pull, tries to clear midwicket, just about manages to do so, didn't get hold of it but is lucky to get a couple
Nannes to Vijay, no run a snorter from Nannes, and Vijay had no answer as it zipped away to beat the outside edge, Haddin took it in front of his pace, excellent bounce
Tait to Gambhir, FOUR runs starts with a full and wide delivery, Gambhir slices it past a diving point to beat third man to the boundary
Tait to Gambhir, no run short of a good length outside off, opens the face and drops it towards backward point

Tait to Gambhir, FOUR runs banged it short on leg stump, Gambhir took his eyes off it while trying it play it into the leg side, got a bit of a top edge to evade the keeper and a diving fine leg, a streaky boundary
Tait to Gambhir, no run bangs it short again, Gambhir plays it well, trying to get on top of it and knocking it down into the leg side
Tait to Gambhir, no run slower one bowled from slightly wide of the crease, tickled towards square leg
Tait to Gambhir, no run a quick bouncer, Gambhir is in his crease and tries to hook that behind square, can't connect, too quick

Nannes to Vijay, OUT Vijay gets the leading edge and is caught, got to him quick, short of a good length outside off and he tried to turn the face and gifted a simple catch to White at cover, it was angling away and he chose the wrong shot
Nannes to Gambhir, 1 run fires it full on middle, pushed towards midwicket
Nannes to Raina, 1 run short of a good length on middle, worked off the back foot behind square for a single
Nannes to Gambhir, no run moving in from a good length pushed it back past the bowler to mid-on
Nannes to Gambhir, no run short of a good length, tries to pull it square, mistimes it

Nannes to Gambhir, OUT gone! Gambhir mistimes again and finds the fielder, 146 kmph and it was quicker than he might have liked, shaped up to play the pull, gets it high on the bat and it lobs up straight towards midwicket
Tait to Raina, no run shortish outside off, trying to angle it away from Raina, guided towards backward point
Tait to Raina, 1 wide bouncer banged in on middle, Raina ducks, it's too high and is called a wide
Tait to Raina, no run short of a good length on the off, defended towards point from the crease
Tait to Raina, FOUR runs too quick for Raina as he tries to pull that but works in his favour, gets a top edge over the keeper's head for a boundary

Tait to Raina, OUT India in trouble now, another short delivery and he tries to pull that over square leg, the Australians are getting good bounce and are putting in the effort, got the top edge again and both Clarke, running in from cover, and the Warner called for it, they
Tait to Rohit Sharma, no run short and wide, shapes to cut, misses
Tait to Rohit Sharma, no run angling it towards middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
Nannes to Yuvraj, 1 run full outside off, steered towards third man for a single
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, no run short of a good length outside off, defended off the back foot towards point
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs Rohit is away, bowls it on a good length on middle, drags it wide of mid-on for a boundary
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, no run Nannes bowls from slightly wide of the crease, pitches it on a good length, tries to drive it through extra cover, misses
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, 1 run closes the face, gets across and turns it through midwicket for a single

Nannes to Yuvraj, OUT bowled'im! Aiming for the blockhole and gets it right, sliding on leg stump, Yuvraj tries to work it through the leg side, misses, it clips the pads and brushes the off stump to leave India in further trouble
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run trying to probe him outside off, gets forward and defends it to extra cover
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run short on middle, tries to pull it hard through square leg, gets an inside edge onto his thighs
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run bangs it short outside off, Rohit moves away, tries to upper cut it over the keeper, misses
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
Watson to Dhoni, no run gets front and across and pushes it towards mid-on
Watson to Dhoni, no run short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defended into the leg side
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run swing and a miss, fullish outside off, tries to swing him over midwicket, misses, just escapes the off stump
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs short on middle, pulled behind square for a couple wide of fine leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short outside off, plays it really late, gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, no run shortish outside off, Dhoni tries to cut that through point, misses
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 wide wide called, shortish but well wide of the right hander
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short outside off, slapped off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs That's disappeared, short on middle and Rohit is in position to dispatch it, rocks back and pulls it hard over deep midwicket
Smith to Dhoni, no run bowls it flat and full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Smith to Dhoni, no run slightly wide of the crease, holds its line, gets forward and pushes it back
Smith to Dhoni, 1 run full, worked away through midwicket for a single
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run low full toss on middle, pushed down the ground to long-on
Smith to Pathan, no run short outside off, chopped towards point
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run bowls it on a good length outside off, guides it down to third man for a single
Johnson to Pathan, no run bouncer, too short outside off, tries to upper cut it over the keeper, misses
Johnson to Pathan, 1 wide short down the leg side and is called by the umpire this time
Johnson to Pathan, no run fuller outside off, Yusuf's eyes light up, tries to smash him over mid-off, misses
Johnson to Pathan, 1 wide full and wide, targets extra cover this time but again can't make any contact
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run short outside off, chops it towards third man for a single
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pushed uppishly through cover into the deep for a single

Johnson to Pathan, OUT well taken by Warner, Yusuf mistimed that one, was full outside off and it appeared he was trying to clear extra cover, ended up slicing it over point and Warner, running in from point, dived forward and grabbed an excellent low catch, Australia are al
Smith to Jadeja, 1 run pushed off the front foot through midwicket for a single
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run comes down the track and pushes it wide of long-on for a single
Smith to Jadeja, 1 run low full toss outside off, driven through the line to long-off
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short on middle, turns away, moves away and cuts it wide of deep point for a single
Smith to Jadeja, 1 run full toss outside off, drilled towards long-off for a single
Smith to Rohit Sharma, no run defended wide of extra cover off the front foot, thinks of a single but it's not there
Watson to Jadeja, 1 run shortish outside off, swats it towards long-off for a single
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run there is no mid-on, had he been there he would have caught that with ease, slower one bowled short, another mistimed pull, just the single
Watson to Jadeja, 1 wide bouncer, doesn't connect on the hook, missed, called a wide
Watson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs Paddle-scoop for six, bowled on a good length on middle and leg and he plays it well enough to clear the fine-leg boundary
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run slower one bowled short outside off, run towards short third man
Watson to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short and he bisects the gap, moves away and pulls it between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
Tait to Harbhajan, 1 run shortish, gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
Tait to Rohit Sharma, no run slower one bowled on middle and leg, moves away and defends it to cover
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide full and wide, too wide and is called by the umpire
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs banged in short on middle, again mistimes a pull, lands safely and they come back for the second
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 1 run yorker on the pads, gets an inside edge behind square for a single
Tait to Harbhajan, no run short on middle and leg, Harbhajan moves well across to work it fine, there is a deviation on the way to the keeper, flicks the shirt
Tait to Harbhajan, no run slower one bowled full on middle, turned away towards midwicket
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on the off stump, steers it towards deep point for a single
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run short on the off, tries to pull him over square leg, misses
Johnson to Harbhajan, 2 runs full outside off, makes room and slices it over point for a couple of runs
Johnson to Harbhajan, FOUR runs nicely struck, short and he shaped up for the pull, striking it after moving back over midwicket for a boundary
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run tries to swing a slower one in the same direction, doesn't connect this time
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 leg bye tries to force it through the on side, is struck on the thigh, Rohit calls for a single and Harbhajan responds
Smith to Harbhajan, 2 wide sliding it down the leg side, tries to sweep it fine, misses
Smith to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs lands on a length, comes down the track and launches him over long-off for a well-struck six
Smith to Rohit Sharma, no run flighted on middle, came down the track and struck it inside out towards extra cover
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs stretches forward and turns it through midwicket for a couple more
Smith to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs made a bit of room this time while simultaneously coming down the track, smashes it hard over wide long-off for another six
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pushed gently through cover to bring up a hard-fought half-century
Smith to Harbhajan, no run drilled back to the bowler who reacts well to stop it
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower one, moves well across and flicks it towards short fine leg for a single
Watson to Harbhajan, SIX runs smash, Harbhajan goes for the hook despite the extra bounce, connects well to send it sailing over midwicket
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
Watson to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs the hundred is up for India, top-edged over the keeper's head, nearly a six

Watson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs much more convincing hit from Rohit this time, length ball outside off, hammered over long-off for six, fielder though he had a chance for a bit, but the ball clears the ropes
Smith to Khan, no run looks to paddle this one, is hit on the pads outside leg
Smith to Khan, SIX runs another six, all of which will help India if it comes down to net run-rate, Zaheer bends his knee and plonks the ball over wide long-on
Smith to Khan, 2 runs shortish ball, pitching around off, spins away from Zaheer, who dabs the ball towards third man
Smith to Khan, 1 run driven firmly down to long-on for a single
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run well outside off, Rohit reaches across to tap it towards sweeper cover
Smith to Khan, no run played with soft hands towards cover, wants the single but is sent back by Rohit
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs full and wide, Rohit doesn't hit it as well as he would have liked, luckily for him mid-off was in the circle, ball clears him
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs another unconvincing shot, down the track and looking to slog towards long-on, but outside edge past keeper for four
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs best shot of the over, backing away and carves the back of length ball between backward point and cover
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs correction, this is the best shot of the over, overpitched by Nannes, Rohit clobbers it over long-on for a big six, Sharma has raced to 76
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, no run shortish ball angling across the batsman, Rohit looks to swipe it to midwicket but doesn't connect
Nannes to Rohit Sharma, 1 run this time he connects with a similar stroke, gets t away to midwicket for a single to retain strike
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a yorker on middle, punched back towards the bowler, just past Tait, single taken off a ricochet off throw at non-striker's end
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide fast and wide down the leg side
Tait to Rohit Sharma, 1 run worked away towards fine leg for a single, can the No. 11 survive the two deliveries of this over?

Exciting news for cricket fans in the USA - the first ever Twenty20 internationals on American soil will take place in Florida on May 20, 22 and 23rd when Sri Lanka will play New Zealand in three Twenty20 matches. For full details and ticketing information, click here.
That's all we have from here folks. Thanks for tuning in and sending us your feedback. It's goodbye for now. But before you sign off, check this out:
Warner is the Man of the Match
India have been completely outplayed today, with Rohit Sharma and Harbhajan Singh being their only saving grace. We'll get you the presentation details in a bit.
Australia won by 49 runs
Player of the match is David Warner, AUS
